title: Lincoln's WARNING #100031: Social Media Algorithm Changes
script: Stop scrolling. You need to hear this... Social Media Algorithm Changes? Every headline feeds the machine that measures your attention in ad seconds. You think you consume it—truth is, it consumes you. Support truth. Bitcoin below. Listen up. Social Media Algorithm Changes... another distraction from the real theft. While you panic, they're laughing to the bank. Wake up. Bitcoin below.
